00040 SnpModelConverterEngine * SnpModelConverterEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00041 {
00042   if(engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == SnpModelConverterEngine::EngineName())
00043     return (SnpModelConverterEngine *)engine;
00044   return NULL;
00045 }

00047 SnpModelConverterEngine::SnpModelConverterEngine()
00048 {
00049   defineOptions(this);
00050 }

00056 void SnpModelConverterEngine::defineOptions(SnpModelConverterEngine *engine)
00057 {
00058 
00059   // Program Control
00060   engine->defineOptionSection("SnpModelConverter Program Control");
00061   defineOption("", "convert-to-sqlite", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00062                "Convert a TSV or HDF5 file to a SQLite database.",
00063                "false");
00064   defineOption("d", "dump-headers", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00065                "Dump both the physical and derived headers with comments. "
00066                "The possible derived headers require one of the types [none,GTC4.1].",
00067                "");
00068   defineOption("", "header-delimiter", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00069                "Delimiter character used when more than one header exists in a file,  "
00070                "or a header is ambiguous. If not supplied then only the first value "
00071                "is returned when multiple values are detected.",
00072                "");
00073   defineOption("", "filter-headers-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00074                "A file containing sample TSV headers to filter on when --dump-headers is used.  "
00075                "NOTE: no validation is done on the headers in as possible model headers.",
00076                "");
00077   defineOption("", "validation-exit", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00078                "The program exits with code 0 if validation is the only error. "
00079                "Use this option to have the program exit -1 when one or more of the "
00080                "the input model files does not validate.",
00081                "false");
00082 
00083 
00084   // Input Section
00085   engine->defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00086   defineOption("", "input-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00087                "Required input models file of type TSV, A5, SQLite or txt.",
00088                "");
00089   defineOption("", "model-files", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00090                "Input file listing a column of models files of type TSV, A5, SQLite or txt."
00091                "File must have a column header of \"model-files\".",
00092                "");
00093 
00094   // Output Section
00095   engine->defineOptionSection("Output Options");
00096   defineOption("", "out-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00097                "The name of an optional output file.",
00098                "");
00099 
00100 }

00103 /**
00104  * Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00105  */
00106 void SnpModelConverterEngine::checkOptionsImp()
00107 {
00108 
00109   //DUMP HEADERS
00110   std::string derivedHeaderType = getOpt("dump-headers");
00111   if(! derivedHeaderType.empty()) {
00112     bool optFound = false;
00113     for(int i = 0; i < SnpModelConverter::LAST_DERIVED_TYPE; i++) {
00114       if(derivedHeaderType == SNP_MODEL_DERIVED_HEADER_TYPE_STRINGS[i]) {
00115         optFound = true;
00116         break;
00117       }
00118     }
00119 
00120     if(! optFound) {
00121       std::stringstream msg;
00122       msg << " " << derivedHeaderType << " : ";
00123       msg << "--dump-headers is an invalid derived type. " << std::endl;
00124       msg << "The derived type must be one of [";
00125       for(int i = 0; i < SnpModelConverter::LAST_DERIVED_TYPE; i++) {
00126         msg << SNP_MODEL_DERIVED_HEADER_TYPE_STRINGS[i] << " ";
00127       }
00128       msg << "].";
00129 
00130       APT_ERR_ABORT(msg.str());
00131     }
00132   }
00133 
00134 
00135   // DELIMITER
00136   if(!getOpt("header-delimiter").empty()) {
00137     if(getOpt("header-delimiter").length() > 1) {
00138       APT_ERR_ABORT(" --header delimiter must be a single character.");
00139     }
00140   }
00141 
00142   // INPUT FILE[S]
00143   std::string inputFile = getOpt("input-file");
00144   std::string modelFiles = getOpt("model-files");
00145   
00146   if ( inputFile.empty() && !modelFiles.empty() ) {
00147     // MODEL FILES LISTING
00148     APT_ERR_ASSERT( Fs::fileExists(modelFiles),
00149                     modelFiles + std::string(" file not found."));
00150     APT_ERR_ASSERT( affx::TsvFile::extractColToVec(modelFiles, "model-files",
00151                                                  &m_modelFiles ) == affx::TSV_OK,
00152                     modelFiles + std::string(" invalid file column header 'model-files' is required."));
00153   }  
00154   else {
00155     if (inputFile.empty()) {
00156       APT_ERR_ABORT(" --input-file or --model-files is required.");
00157     }
00158     else if (!Fs::fileExists(inputFile)) {
00159       APT_ERR_ABORT(inputFile + " file not found.");
00160     }
00161     m_modelFiles.push_back( inputFile );
00162   }
00163 
00164   // FILTER HEADERS FILE
00165   std::string filterHeadersFile = getOpt("filter-headers-file");
00166   if ( !filterHeadersFile.empty() ) {
00167     if (!Fs::fileExists(filterHeadersFile)) {
00168       APT_ERR_ABORT(filterHeadersFile + " file not found.");
00169     }    
00170   }
00171   
00172 }
00173 
00174 void SnpModelConverterEngine::runImpDumpHeaders(const std::map< std::string , std::string *> & headers)
00175 {
00176 
00177   std::map< std::string , std::string *>::const_iterator it;
00178   std::map< std::string , std::string > filterHeaders;
00179   std::string filterHeadersFile = getOpt("filter-headers-file");
00180 
00181   try {
00182     if ( !filterHeadersFile.empty() ) {
00183       affx::TsvFile tsv;
00184       tsv.open(filterHeadersFile);
00185       tsv.headersBegin();
00186       std::string key, value;
00187       while ( tsv.headersNext( key, value ) == affx::TSV_OK ) {
00188         filterHeaders[key] = value;
00189       }
00190       tsv.close();
00191     }
00192 
00193     for(it = headers.begin(); it != headers.end(); it++) {
00194       if ( filterHeaders.size() &&
00195            (filterHeaders.count(it->first) == 0) ) {
00196         continue;
00197       }
00198       cout << it->first << "=";
00199       if(it->second == NULL) {
00200         cout << "NULL";
00201       } else {
00202         cout << *(it->second) ;
00203       }
00204       cout << endl;
00205     }
00206   }
00207   catch (...) {
00208   }
00209 }
00210 
00211 void SnpModelConverterEngine::runImpConvertToDb( const std::string & modelFilePath ) {
00212         
00213   if ( SnpModelDb::isSqlModelFile( modelFilePath ) ) {
00214     Verbose::warn(1, " --convert-to-sqlite option ignored, file is already SQLite");
00215     
00216   }
00217   else {
00218     std::string sqlFile = modelFilePath;
00219     if ( !getOpt("out-file").empty() ) {
00220       sqlFile = getOpt("out-file");
00221     }
00222     else {
00223       std::string::size_type pos;
00224       std::string ext;
00225       pos  = modelFilePath.rfind(".");
00226       if ( pos != std::string::npos ) {
00227         ext = modelFilePath.substr(pos);
00228       }
00229       if ( (ext == ".a5")  || ( ext == ".txt" ) || (ext == ".tsv" ) ) {
00230         sqlFile = Fs::noextname1(modelFilePath) + ".db";
00231       }
00232       else {
00233         sqlFile = modelFilePath + ".db";
00234       }
00235     }
00236     if ( Fs::touch(sqlFile, false) != APT_OK ) {
00237       Verbose::warn(1, " --convert-to-sqlite permission denied for file " + sqlFile );
00238     }
00239     else {
00240       SnpModelConverter dummy;
00241       dummy.convertToDbModel(modelFilePath, sqlFile);
00242       Verbose::out(1, sqlFile + " sqlite file created.");
00243     }
00244   }
00245 }
00246 
00247 /**
00248    This is the "main()" equivalent of the engine.
00249 */
00250 void SnpModelConverterEngine::runImp()
00251 {
00252 
00253   
00254   bool exitOk = true;
00255   std::string src;
00256   std::string test = getOpt("header-delimiter");
00257   std::string headerType = getOpt("dump-headers");
00258   
00259   for ( int i = 0; i < m_modelFiles.size(); i++ ) {
00260     src = Fs::Unc(m_modelFiles[i]);
00261 
00262     if ( ! Fs::fileExists( src ) ) {
00263       Verbose::warn(1, src + " file not found." );
00264       exitOk = false;
00265       continue;
00266     }
00267     std::map< std::string, std::string *> headers;
00268 
00269     bool isModel =
00270       SnpModelConverter::GetModelHeaders(src, headerType , headers,
00271                                          test.empty() ? NULL : &(test[0]));
00272     // DUMP HEADERS
00273     if(! headerType.empty()) {
00274       runImpDumpHeaders(headers);
00275     }
00276 
00277     if(isModel) {
00278       Verbose::out(1, src + ToStr(" valid model file detected."));
00279       if ( getOptBool("convert-to-sqlite") ) {
00280         runImpConvertToDb(src);
00281       }
00282     }
00283     else if ( !getOpt("model-files").empty() ) {
00284       Verbose::warn(1,src + " is not a recognized model file.");
00285     }
00286 
00287     exitOk = exitOk && isModel;
00288   }
00289 
00290   if ( ! exitOk ) {
00291     if ( ! getOpt("input-file").empty() ) {
00292       Verbose::warn(1, src + " is not a recognized model file.");
00293     }
00294     else {
00295       Verbose::warn(1, " Invalid model files detected.");
00296     }
00297     if ( getOptBool("validation-exit") ) {
00298       APT_ERR_ABORT(" validation error exit requested.");
00299     }
00300   }
00301   return;
00302 }
